concept.title: Stream Settings
concept.shortdesc: Overall, most settings will be fairly self-explanatory.

conbody.p: The following settings are available to fine tune your output.

ul.li: Select one of the included Services (Check "Show all services" to see the full list in the dropdown) or set Custom Streaming Server
Enable/disable system tray icon (required for hiding to tray)
Enter your Stream Key (this can generally be found using the 'Get Stream Key' button)
